attributes.action: Make it obligatory for all 'part of the job' correspondence by or sent to a taxpayer funded employee to be placed in the public domain.
attributes.additional_details: Far too much information generated in the conduct of taxpayer funded activities in this land are being kept secret from the people who pay for that information.  All employees of the taxpayer, at national or local level, have an obligation to honesty when dealing on behalf of the taxpayer.  There is absolutely NO reason why matters not involving national security cannot be placed in the public domain automatically.  There should be no need for taxpayers to have to ask to be told what is going on in their name and they CERTAINLY should not be required to pay for it a second time!
